meanings.definition: The act of spilling or the amount spilled.
meanings.sent1: The spillages on the floor needed to be cleaned up quickly.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally caused spillages of milk while pouring it into the glass.
meanings.sent3: The spillages of glitter on the table made it look like a fairy had visited.
meanings.sent4: The spillages of secrets during the meeting led to chaos in the office.
meanings.sent5: The spillages of paint on the canvas created a beautiful abstract artwork.

meanings.sent1: The spillages from the broken cup stained the carpet.
meanings.sent2: He cleaned up the spillages of juice from the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: The spillages of popcorn on the couch made it a crunchy seat.
meanings.sent4: Her tears were the emotional spillages of a heart full of sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The spillages of water from the overflowing sink flooded the kitchen floor.
